titleStmt.title: Unto his Grace, the Marquess of Tweeddale, his Majesties High Commissioner, and the remanent honourable Estates of Parliament. The supplication of the brewers in Edinburgh, Leith and suburbs of the samen, and Sheriffdom of Mid-Lothian.
titleStmt.author: Tweeddale, Charles Hay, Marquis of, 1667-1715.
Scotland. Parliament. Committee of Estates.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
